content: basic mitten pattern for kids by jacqueline henderson a complete instructional video on how to knit these mittens can be found here https //youtu be/zszlov-jpsi materials size us6 dpns yarn used worsted weight yarn - recommend an acrylic or wool blend yarn gauge 4 x4 = 17 stitches 27 row in stockinette stitch size kids ages 5-10 abbreviations k knit p purl dpn double pointed needle sts stitches pm place marker sm slip marker 1 | p a ge © jacqueline henderson www youtube com/@jacqknits round s round s m1r make one right increase m1l make one left increase k2tog knit two together decrease ssk slip slip knit decrease pattern cuff with size us 6 dpns cast on 28 stitches distribute stitches to 3 dpns join in the round round 1 *k1 p1* repeat to end of round repeat round 1 for 15 rnds approx 2 5 after cuff knit one row all knit thumb gusset right hand left hand set up round k2 pm set up round k to last 5 sts pm k3 pm k to end of round k3 pm k to end of round round 1 k to marker sm m1r k to marker m1l sm k to end of round round 2 knit all round 3 knit all repeat rnds 1-3 till 11 sts are between markers ending with round 1 knit to marker remove marker place 11 sts onto stitch holder or scrap yarn cast on 3 sts using backward loop and knit to end of round 28 stitches on needle hand knit all stitches for each round for 20 rounds or till it reaches just past the tip of your child s pinky finger when wearing tip be sure to count your rounds so you know how many rounds to knit for the 2nd mitten 2 | p a ge © jacqueline henderson www youtube com/@jacqknits decrease rounds set up k14 pm k14 round 1 k2tog k to 3 sts before marker ssk k1 sm k2tog k to 3 sts to end ssk k1 4 st decrease round 2 knit all round 3 repeat round 1 round 4 repeat round 2 round 5 repeat round 1 round 6 repeat round 1 12 stitches remain on needle break yarn with darning needle thread yarn and draw through remaining stitches pull tight to close push needle through hole to inside secure by threading again through last few stitches weave in end thumb put 3 sts from co edge inside of thumb onto 1 dpn divide held sts between two other dpns 14 stitches on needles with new working yarn start round beginning with co sts if stitches are placed on the needle backward knit these stitches through the back loop tip tuck in your tail to the inside of the mitten before continuing to knit knit all stitches for every round for 10 rounds or until it reaches just past the thumb when worn tip be sure to count your rounds so you know how
